divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving to a basketball game and we witnessed lights similar to ahelicopter or small plane up ahead. What made it weird was that it kept flashinga very bright light, similar to a lighthouse motion, very quick and randmoly. Aswe approached the craft, it would begin to move one way as it were goingsomehwere, and all of a sudden it would stop and emit another beam of light.There was one or two lights on the craft, and we became certain that it wasneither a helicopter or a small plane due to its movements and lightpositioning. The guys in the car behind us luckily got it on tape, its visiblefor about 15 seconds and then it suddenly speeds off in the blink of an eye. Thecraft was quite close to the ground, compared to any airplane. It was strange.
